Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Djehutyirdis with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands holding a relief adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with nine rows of Hieroglyphic text; back-pillar and plinth.
Condition: good but repaired at knee and ankle level
